message: Rule applicable: flatten_nested_sum ([("Base", 8800)]), to expression: Sum([Sum([Sum([Sum([x, 10]), 20]), y]), 5]), resulting in: Sum([Sum([Sum([x, 10]), 20]), y, 5])
Rule applicable: flatten_nested_sum ([("Base", 8800)]), to expression: Sum([Sum([Sum([x, 10]), 20]), y, 5]), resulting in: Sum([Sum([x, 10]), 20, y, 5])
Rule applicable: partial_evaluator ([("Base", 9000)]), to expression: Sum([Sum([x, 10]), 20, y, 5]), resulting in: Sum([Sum([x, 10]), y, 25])
Rule applicable: flatten_nested_sum ([("Base", 8800)]), to expression: Sum([Sum([x, 10]), y, 25]), resulting in: Sum([x, 10, y, 25])
Rule applicable: sum_eq_to_sumeq ([("Minion", 4400)]), to expression: (Sum([x, 10, y, 25]) = 100), resulting in: SumEq([x, 10, y, 25], 100)
Rule applicable: partial_evaluator ([("Base", 9000)]), to expression: SumEq([x, 10, y, 25], 100), resulting in: SumEq([x, y], 65)
Rule applicable: sumeq_to_minion ([("Minion", 4400)]), to expression: SumEq([x, y], 65), resulting in: And([SumGeq([x, y], 65), SumLeq([x, y], 65)])
